gw.testharness.clustering

Class ClusterMember

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.testharness.clustering.ClusterMember

  • public class ClusterMember
extends java.lang.Object
    Handle to the remote server. Can be used to ask the server to call methods and run tests. Provides several cluster-related convinient methods OOTB.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClusterMember(java.lang.String webUrl, java.lang.String serverId, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> roles, gw.testharness.clustering.ServerInstance serverInstance, ClusterTest test)
      Creates a handle to remote server

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClusterMember

        public ClusterMember(java.lang.String webUrl,
                     java.lang.String serverId,
                     java.util.Set<java.lang.String> roles,
                     gw.testharness.clustering.ServerInstance serverInstance,
                     ClusterTest test)
        Creates a handle to remote server
        Parameters:
        webUrl - URL on which the web interface of the server is available
        serverId - Server ID for the remote server
        roles - server roles (null means default roles)
        serverInstance - server instance associated with that cluster member
        test - running test.

      • stopServer

        public void stopServer()
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Gracefully stops the sever. Note that while stopping the server will send LEAVE message to the cluster notifying other nodes about its stop (thus will be excluded out of the cluster immediately).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • killServer

        public void killServer()
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Stop server WITHOUT notifying other nodes in the cluster, i.e. from the cluster point of view this method simulates incorrect shutdown of the server.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • callTestMethod

        public java.lang.Object callTestMethod(java.lang.String method,
                                       java.io.Serializable... args)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Call specified method on the server. If method throws an exception it will be serialized, transferred back to the caller, deserialized, and re-thrown from this method.
        Parameters:
        method - method name.
        args - optional array of arguments
        Returns:
        result of the method if any.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - local or remote exception (WrappedRemoteException)

      • runGosuTestMethod

                              java.lang.String testMethod,
                              java.io.Serializable... args)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Run Gosu test on the server
        Parameters:
        testClass - fully qualified name of the test class.
        testMethod - test method
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - local or remote exception (WrappedRemoteException)

      • callMethod

        public java.lang.Object callMethod(java.lang.Class<?> clazz,
                                   java.lang.String method,
                                   java.io.Serializable... args)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Call specified method on the server. If method throws an exception it will be serialized, transferred back to the caller, deserialized, and re-thrown from this method.
        Parameters:
        clazz - method owner
        method - method name.
        args - optional array of arguments
        Returns:
        result of the method if any.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - local or remote exception (WrappedRemoteException)
